name: Spellcaster prototype
description:
A basic RPG prototype made for a GameDevTV gamejam with the theme "Death is only the beginning". Go around and cast spells to fight enemies. After a brief tutorial you'll even allow them to join you using a bit of necromancy

Includes some basic implementations of core RPG mechanics: 

- core combat is based on targeting enemies and casting spells with a very basic mouse gestures interpreter

- story triggers and progression, as well as story blockers

- dialogue system with input from scriptable objects

- basic AI
